Detailed Description

C++ error handler associated with the USGS central CA velocity model.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum StatusEnum

Enumerated type for error status.

Enumerator:
OK 

No errors.

WARNING 

Non-fatal error.

ERROR 

Fatal error.

void loggingOn ( const bool  turnOn = true)

Turn logging on/off.

Precondition:
The log filename must have been set for logging to work if it is turned on.
Note:
Turning logging on after it has been turned off will cause subsequent messages to be appended to the log file.
Parameters:
turnOnTrue to turn on logging, false to turn logging off
